segment.source: Sharing and collaboration
segment.target: Sharing and collaboration

segment.source: Sharing and collaboration
segment.target: Sharing and collaboration

segment.source: Sharing and collaboration
segment.target: Sharing and collaboration

segment.source: You can package a trace in a zip file along with the corresponding session, annotations, and (optionally) loaded symbols with WPA.
segment.target: You can package a trace in a zip file along with the corresponding session, annotations, and (optionally) loaded symbols with WPA.

segment.source: This allows you to share this package with other developers and replaces WPA sessions.
segment.target: This allows you to share this package with other developers and replaces WPA sessions.

segment.source: A WPA package ("trace package) captures the entire analysis session:
segment.target: A WPA package ("trace package) captures the entire analysis session:

segment.source: Trace
segment.target: Trace

segment.source: Tabs
segment.target: Tabs

segment.source: Graph configurations
segment.target: Graph configurations

segment.source: Filters
segment.target: Filters

segment.source: Annotations
segment.target: Annotations

segment.source: Symbols Note WPA only packages symbols if they are loaded; if they are, WPA embeds them in the package.
segment.target: Symbols Note WPA only packages symbols if they are loaded; if they are, WPA embeds them in the package.

segment.source: WPA does not preserve stack expansions.
segment.target: WPA does not preserve stack expansions.

segment.source: Benefits of sharing a trace package
segment.target: Benefits of sharing a trace package

segment.source: Aside from being able to share a trace package with other developers, trace packages offer several other benefits:
segment.target: Aside from being able to share a trace package with other developers, trace packages offer several other benefits:

segment.source: Less space since trace packages are zipped
segment.target: Less space since trace packages are zipped

segment.source: Support for and ability to open zipped-up trace files in WPA
segment.target: Support for and ability to open zipped-up trace files in WPA

segment.source: Ability to open a trace package multiple times without needing to extract the same trace multiple times
segment.target: Ability to open a trace package multiple times without needing to extract the same trace multiple times

segment.source: Plugin verification and warnings if plugins aren't present when WPA opens your trace package.
segment.target: Plugin verification and warnings if plugins aren't present when WPA opens your trace package.

segment.source: Note This process zips up your trace in the package.
segment.target: Note This process zips up your trace in the package.

segment.source: If your trace has an issue and contains sensitive material and you send it to us for further investigation, make sure to protect any sensitive material as you would any trace.
segment.target: If your trace has an issue and contains sensitive material and you send it to us for further investigation, make sure to protect any sensitive material as you would any trace.

segment.source: Due to zipping, the package will likely have a file size smaller compared to a trace; this does not mean the zipping process removed any sensitive information.
segment.target: Due to zipping, the package will likely have a file size smaller compared to a trace; this does not mean the zipping process removed any sensitive information.

segment.source: Sharing a trace package
segment.target: Sharing a trace package

segment.source: To create a profile, first configure your view layout as you want it to appear, and then do the following:
segment.target: To create a profile, first configure your view layout as you want it to appear, and then do the following:

segment.source: In the menu, choose File then Export Package.
segment.target: In the menu, choose File then Export Package.

segment.source: A Save As dialog opens.
segment.target: A Save As dialog opens.

segment.source: Navigate to the desired location.
segment.target: Navigate to the desired location.

segment.source: Name your export package, make sure the Save as type reads WPA Package (.wpapk)and click Save.
segment.target: Name your export package, make sure the Save as type reads WPA Package (.wpapk)and click Save.

segment.source: A Wpapk progress bar displays, indicating packaging process.
segment.target: A Wpapk progress bar displays, indicating packaging process.

segment.source: You may close the window, as the process will continue running in the background until complete.
segment.target: You may close the window, as the process will continue running in the background until complete.
